collection.title: Portable & Travel Sound Machines
collection.body_html: Ensure a good night's sleep wherever you are. Our compact and rechargeable portable sound machines are perfect for travel, the office, or for babies in their pram.

Create a calm, soothing environment anywhere with the Aetherzx Portable White Noise Night Light USB Cup. Combining soft night lighting with relaxing white noise, this multifunctional sleep aid is perfect for bedrooms, nurseries, offices, or travel. Its compact, cup-shaped design makes it portable, stylish, and easy to use.

  • USB Powered: Convenient charging for daily use

products.title: Dreamos Portable White Noise Sleep Aid Machine for Restful Sleep & Comfort
products.body_html:
Dreamos Portable White Noise Sleep Aid Machine for Restful Sleep & Comfort

Help your child sleep peacefully with the Dreamos Portable White Noise Sleep Aid, designed to create a calming and soothing environment. This intelligent sleep machine offers 29 built-in audio sources, including lullabies, nature sounds, and white noise, to help children fall asleep faster and stay asleep longer.

With a 1200mAh rechargeable battery, it provides over 10 hours of continuous operation, making it perfect for bedtime, naps, travel, or daycare. Its compact and portable design ensures it fits easily on nightstands, desks, or travel bags, providing comfort anywhere.

Key Features:

  • 29 Soothing Audio Tracks: Lullabies, nature sounds, and white noise for restful sleep.

  • Long-Lasting Battery: 1200mAh battery with 10+ hours of continuous operation.

  • Portable Design: Compact and lightweight for travel or home use.

  • Intelligent Sleep Aid: Promotes relaxation and better sleep quality for children.

  • User-Friendly: Simple to operate, perfect for kids’ bedtime routine.

Specifications:

  • Battery Capacity: 1200mAh

  • Endurance: 10 hours or more

  • Product Size: 96 × 78 × 112 mm

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Helps children fall asleep faster and sleep more soundly
✔ Portable design for home, travel, or daycare
✔ Long-lasting battery for uninterrupted use
✔ Intelligent sleep aid with multiple sound options

products.title: Elaral White Noise Flame Aromatherapy Humidifier Machine for Home Relaxation & Comfort
products.body_html:
Elaral White Noise Flame Aromatherapy Humidifier Machine for Home Relaxation & Comfort

Transform your home into a calm and soothing sanctuary with the Elaral White Noise Flame Aromatherapy Machine. Combining white noise, aromatherapy, and flame simulation, this device is perfect for bedrooms, living rooms, or small offices. It helps create a relaxing environment for sleep, meditation, or stress relief.

Featuring a quiet operation below 36dB and a mechanical control system, the Elaral aromatherapy machine is easy to use and safe. Its USB power mode ensures convenience, while the 0.5L water tank and single fog outlet provide a gentle and consistent mist for small spaces.

Key Features:

  • White Noise Simulation: Enhances relaxation and improves sleep quality.

  • Flame & Aromatherapy Effect: Creates a cozy and calming ambiance.

  • USB Power Mode: Convenient and energy-efficient operation.

  • Quiet & Efficient: Noise below 36dB, ideal for bedrooms and offices.

  • Compact Design: Fits rooms from 21–30 ㎡, lightweight and stylish.

Specifications:

  • Power Mode: USB

  • Applicable Area: 21–30 ㎡

  • Shape: Square

  • Noise Level: <36dB

  • Timing Function: Up to 2 hours

  • Water Tank Capacity: ≤0.5L

  • Operation Mode: Mechanical

  • Number of Fog Outlets: 1

  • Rated Power: 6W

  • Color: White Noise (English)

  • Shell Material: ABS mute

  • Fog Type: Mist

  • Capacity: 200mL

  • Size: 200 × 130 × 90 mm

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Combines aromatherapy, white noise, and flame simulation for relaxation
✔ USB-powered for convenience and energy efficiency
✔ Quiet operation ideal for sleep, meditation, or work
✔ Compact, stylish, and suitable for small household spaces
✔ Simple mechanical operation for easy use

Package Contents:

  • 1 × Elaral White Noise Simulation Flame Aromatherapy Machine

products.title: Ossiom Bone Conduction Bluetooth Speaker Mini White Noise Sleep Aid for Sleep and Relaxation
products.body_html:
Ossiom Bone Conduction Bluetooth Speaker Mini White Noise Sleep Aid for Sleep and Relaxation

Enhance your sleep and relaxation with the Ossiom Bone Conduction Bluetooth Speaker, a compact device that delivers high-quality sound through bone conduction technology. Designed to improve sleep, this mini speaker plays seven types of soothing white noise while allowing Bluetooth connectivity for music playback from your devices.

Its lightweight and portable design makes it perfect for home, office, travel, or bedtime use. Equipped with a 500mAh polymer battery, it provides up to 15 hours of continuous playtime on a single charge, ensuring your sleep environment stays peaceful all night.

Available in white, pink, and black, this device combines modern design with functional sleep improvement, making it ideal for both adults and children.

Key Features:

  • Bone Conduction Technology: Clear, vibration-based sound without disturbing others.

  • White Noise Playback: Seven soothing sound options for sleep and relaxation.

  • Bluetooth Connection: Stream music wirelessly from your smartphone or tablet.

  • Long Battery Life: 500mAh battery offers ≥15 hours of continuous use.

  • Compact & Portable: Mini design fits easily on bedside tables or travel bags.

  • Fast Charging: Fully charged in 1 hour via Type-C 5V input.

Specifications:

  • Bluetooth Version: 5.0

  • Battery Capacity: 3.7V polymer lithium battery, 500mAh

  • Speaker: 6 Ω 1.5W dual speakers

  • Effective Distance: ≥10 meters

  • Frequency Range: 20Hz–20kHz

  • Material: ABS

  • Color Options: White, Pink, Black

  • Product Size: 80 × 80 × 13 mm

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Bone conduction ensures undisturbed, clear sound
✔ Seven white noise options help improve sleep quality
✔ Portable design perfect for travel or bedside use
✔ Long-lasting battery with fast Type-C charging
✔ Stylish and functional for adults and children

Package Contents:

  • 1 × Ossiom Bone Conduction Bluetooth Speaker

  • 1 × Charging Cable

  • 1 × Instruction Manual

products.body_html:
Verseizx Home White Noise Sleep Instrument Relaxing Sound Machine for Rest & Focus

Transform your space into a sanctuary of peace with the Verseizx Home White Noise Sleep Instrument. Designed to mask disruptive background sounds, it promotes deeper sleep, improved focus, and enhanced relaxation for both children and adults. Perfect for bedrooms, nurseries, offices, or meditation spaces, this compact device is your go-to wellness companion.

Key Features:

  • Multiple Sound Options: Choose from white noise, calming nature sounds, and soft tones

  • Adjustable Timer: Set 30, 60, 90 minutes, or continuous play for convenience

  • Portable Design: Lightweight and compact for effortless placement anywhere

  • USB Rechargeable: Energy-efficient and easy to power up

  • Gentle Noise Level: Soothing sounds without being disruptive

Specifications:

  • Power Supply: USB rechargeable

  • Timer Options: 30 / 60 / 90 minutes or continuous play

  • Sound Modes: White noise, nature sounds, soft tones

  • Usage: Sleep, meditation, study, office, nursery

  • Weight: Lightweight, portable design

Why You’ll Love It:

  • Blocks out distractions to improve sleep quality

  • Helps babies, children, and adults fall asleep faster

  • Enhances relaxation during meditation or study

  • Compact size makes it easy to use anywhere

  • A stylish wellness essential for stress-free living

Package Contents:

  • 1 x Verseizx Home White Noise Sleep Instrument

  • 1 x USB Charging Cable

  • 1 x User Manual

products.title: Whisperzx Baby Sleep Soothers Sound Machine Portable White Noise Sleep Aid for Peaceful Sleep & Comfort Sleep
products.body_html:
Whisperzx Baby Sleep Soothers Sound Machine Portable White Noise Sleep Aid for Peaceful Sleep & Comfort Sleep

 

The Whisperzx Baby Sleep Soothers Sound Machine creates a calm and relaxing environment for babies, toddlers, and even adults. With 9 soothing sounds, a voice recording function, and an auto-off timer, it helps your little one fall asleep faster and enjoy longer, more restful sleep. Compact, rechargeable, and portable, this device is perfect for use at home, nursery, or while traveling, providing comfort and peace of mind for parents.

Key Features:

  • 9 soothing sounds including white noise, lullabies, and nature sounds

  • Voice recording and smart sensor to comfort your baby when they cry

  • Auto-off timer for convenient sleep routines

  • Rechargeable and portable design

  • Compact size for home, nursery, or travel use

Specifications:

  • Type: Baby Sleep Soothers Sound Machine

  • Brand: Whisperzx

  • Functions: White noise, lullabies, nature sounds, sleep aid

  • Suitable for: Newborns, toddlers, children, and adults

  • Design: Compact, portable, and easy-to-use

  • Power: Rechargeable

Why You'll Love It:

  • Creates a peaceful sleep environment for better rest

  • Voice recording and smart sensor provide comfort automatically

  • Auto-off timer supports healthy sleep routines

  • Compact and portable for home, nursery, or travel

  • Easy to operate and maintain, suitable for babies and adults

Package Contents:

  • 1 x Whisperzx Baby Sleep Soothers Sound Machine
